title: Sound On: Dems Budget Revolt, Evictions (Radio)
itunes:title: Sound On: Dems Budget Revolt, Evictions (Radio)
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.


Guests: Virginia Congressman Don Beyer, Adam Belmar, former Deputy Assistant to the President and Deputy Director of White House Communications, and Bloomberg Government reporters Jack Fitzpatrick and Emily Wilkins.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
